data.title: Bus services from Bangkok to Phnom Penh and Siem Reap resume on Friday
data.description: Service to Cambodian cities restart from Friday after being stopped in March 2020 due to the pandemic

data.title: Rare diseases: A global healthcare challenge
data.description: With only 5% of rare diseases treatable today, there is a clear need for global partnerships and policy reforms to address this urgent challenge

data.title: 136,000+ families in 7 southern provinces hit by heavy flooding
data.description: Disaster Prevention and Mitigation Department says it issued warnings and coordinated with mobile operators to send SMS alerts to residents

data.title: Tourists are flocking to Lopburi’s spectacular sunflower fields
data.description: Spread over 1,600 hectares, the fields offer tourism and agricultural value to the province

data.title: Thailand gets its first 3 Michelin-starred restaurant
data.description: Sorn becomes the first Thai restaurant in the world to be awarded three Michelin stars at the eighth edition of the  Michelin Guide Thailand  2025, held in Bangkok today.

data.title: C.P. Group warns against fraudulent investment scams using senior chairman’s name
data.description: Regarding fraudulent activities currently circulating on social media, scammers have been using the name and image of Mr. Dhanin Chearavanont, Senior Chairman of C.P. Group, in fabricated news articles and advertisements designed to look like credible content from reputable media outlets.

data.title: Colombian arrested over THB3.3m theft in Bangkok mall car park
data.description: Police seize 20 gold bars and cash from suspect but say accomplice has fled to Cambodia with most of loot stolen from luxury car

data.title: Singapore PM in Thailand as both countries strive for closer ties
data.description: Cooperation in new areas of mutual interest on the agenda

data.title: Floods worsen in Narathiwat, 68 schools close amid rising waters
data.description: Heavy continuous rain makes three main rivers break their banks and inundate more than 40,000 families in 13 districts

data.title: Police join multi-agency response to flooding in South Thailand
data.description: National police chief instructs southern police bureaus to mobilise officers to help flood victims as 13 provinces face heavy rains and flash flooding

data.title: Mapping disasters: How one geologist is saving lives in Thailand
data.description: Prof Santi Pailoplee’s MitrEarth website became a lifeline for northern residents inundated by catastrophic flooding this year

data.title: Police bust int’l ring selling fake accounts to online criminals
data.description: Fifteen arrested, hundreds of thousands of SIM cards seized in Operation ‘CIB Crushes the Grey Dragon’

data.title: Overnight downpours flood parts of Hat Yai
data.description: City centre remains unaffected but homes in outer areas including Kho Hong district have seen flooding

data.title: Spring News wins honorable mention for Outstanding Online Video Clip
data.description: Video looked at the origins of the Israel-Palestine conflict, the history of which can be traced back thousands of years

data.title: Bar B Q Plaza elevates mascot Bar B GON to ‘Best Friend Brand’
data.description: Business fable marks a strategic pivot towards more narrative-driven marketing approaches

data.title: South warned of heavy rains and floods, cooler in North
data.description: Thirteen Southern provinces warned to brace for heavy downpours and flash flooding as weather deteriorates

data.title: Chinese EVs, economic factors drive vehicle repossession up
data.description: Auction firm sees 8.7% increase in the number of vehicles being repossessed, with many of them pick-ups used by their owners for commercial purposes

data.title: Cambodia identifies path to improved connectivity
data.description: Cambodia is laying the groundwork to become a regional trade hub in Southeast Asia, through strategic infrastructure investments and policy reforms.

data.title: Unclear if NS defaulter Ben Davis will join Thai team for Asean Cup in Singapore
data.description: National service (NS) defaulter Ben Davis has been called up by Thailand for the Asian Mitsubishi Electric Cup, setting up a potential showdown with the Lions and the Singapore authorities.

data.title: Cambodian Deputy PM denies funding issues in Funan Techo Canal project
data.description: Deputy Prime Minister Sun Chanthol, chairman of the Special Commission on the Funan Techo Canal construction project, has confirmed that the project remains on track, brushing off international media reports that allege delays caused by financial issues on China’s part.

data.title: Chanthol dismisses international reports of Funan Techo Canal funding challenges
data.description: Deputy Prime Minister Sun Chanthol, chairman of the Special Commission on the Funan Techo Canal construction project, has confirmed that the project remains on track, brushing off international media reports that allege delays caused by financial issues on China’s part.

data.title: Thai Senior organizes international Sogo Malaysia Senior Championship Phuket
data.description: Thai Senior organizes the international Sogo Malaysia Senior Championship Phuket, and grants scholarships of 100,000 baht to local schools.

data.title: Probiotics Consortium to advance research and functional food industry
data.description: The Program Management Unit for Competitiveness (PMUC), under the Ministry of Higher Education, Science, Research, and Innovation, hosted an MOU signing ceremony to establish the Probiotics Research Consortium, aiming to enhance Thai research and industry competitiveness.

data.title: Singapore's Prime Minister Lawrence Wong to visit Thailand on November 28
data.description: Prime Minister Lawrence Wong will visit Bangkok on Nov 28 at the invitation of Thai Prime Minister Paetongtarn Shinawatra.

data.title: Thailand cuts FIDF remittances, extending public debt repayment
data.description: Move expected to cut public debt by 63% by end of fiscal 2025

data.title: How Thai Airways plans to expand and reclaim market dominance
data.description: CEO unveils ambitious strategy to take 35% market share by 2029

data.title: THAI to offer shares at 4.48 baht in debt-to-equity conversion
data.description: Thai Airways’ plan to offer over 9 billion ordinary shares to eligible shareholders from December 6 to 12 has been met with strong creditor interest

data.title: Paetongtarn hosts 40 US firms, promises support for investments
data.description: The meeting centred on strengthening bilateral economic ties, with a special focus on clean energy, digital tech and the film industry

data.title: SRT suspends services to the deep South as railway tracks flooded
data.description: The State Railway of Thailand (SRT) adjusted its itinerary on the Southern Line on Wednesday due to severe flooding.

data.title: Floods inundate over a 100 households in Songkhla and Yala provinces
data.description: Locals in Songkhla and Yala provinces were forced to evacuate to higher ground following floods caused by heavy rains early on Wednesday.

data.title: Phumtham says he’s yet to study report on stalled submarine project
data.description: Defence minister denies dragging his feet on prickly issue

data.title: Thai maid’s 100 million baht inheritance comes under legal scrutiny
data.description: Though many believe Auntie Tim may lose her windfall, a senior public prosecutor says the French woman’s questionable business practices and her will are unrelated

data.title: Thailand expects sweet economic boost from its cocoa ambitions
data.description: The country aims to become a cocoa hub in the region by boosting local industry, promoting high-quality products and branding them as GI items

data.title: Inside the Pheu Thai PR machine fighting Thailand’s information war
data.description: Key figures ramp up efforts to shape the party's image, counter criticism, and rally support amid growing challenges to the government

data.title: New feasts for your palate
data.description: Bangkok is a city that never sleeps, at least in the food and beverage department. Blink and you’ll miss another new restaurant opening or a drink launch. Guru By Bangkok Post  is making sure that even if you blink, you don’t miss out on the new taste tinglers that are worth mentioning.

data.title: DSI, SEC urged to probe Thai Oil’s tanked THB160-bn clean fuel project
data.description: Chief of consumer network warns listed company risks bankruptcy because of the actions of some execs

data.title: Bangkok’s historic Chakrabongse Villas open to visitors for two days
data.description: The 116 years old Chakrabongse Villas in Bangkok’s Phra Nakhon district will be opened to visitors as a part of the 6th Antiques & Culture Fair from November 30 to December 1.

data.title: Thailand’s electricity price set to drop slightly in 2025
data.description: Energy minister says the cut is part of the government’s New Year’s gifts for the public, adding more price reductions are being explored

data.title: 3 arrested, 101 million baht in assets seized in ONCB crackdown
data.description: This operation in five provinces, including Bangkok, follows up on a previous successful crackdown that provided intelligence on bigger players
